channel.title: LLMs on Afnan Alabdulwahab
channel.description: Recent content in LLMs on Afnan Alabdulwahab

item.title: Comparative Study of Large Language Model Evaluation Frameworks
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of evaluation frameworks for LLMs, focusing on bias detection, response quality, and robustness.

item.title: Understanding DeepEval's Bias Evaluation Methodology
item.description: A deep dive into DeepEval's methodology for bias detection in LLM-generated text, covering opinion extraction, structured evaluation, and scoring.

item.title: The Turing Test: Detecting LLM-Generated Content
item.description: A research project exploring methods for detecting AI-generated text, benchmarking existing detection models, and developing a robust classifier to distinguish human-written and LLM-generated content.
